summary: Frontend testing for EcoSayahat - 360° Pannellum iframe implementation. All requested features working correctly. Registration, login, region selection, attractions tab, 360° view in modal, review system, eco-taxi, and hotels - all passing.

design_issues.issue: Minor hydration warning in console: 'In HTML, <span> cannot be a child of <option>'. This is from i18n translation in select options but doesn't affect functionality.

passed_tests: Registration of new tourist user works correctly
Login flow works (via registration, redirects to main page)
Region selection page displays all 5 regions: Каспий, Бурабай, Алаколь, Балхаш, Кольсай
Tourist dashboard loads with 6 tabs: Карта, Достопримечательности, Эко-такси, Отели, Задания, О нас
Attractions tab displays 3 Burabay attraction cards: Скала Жумбактас, Озеро Бурабай, Гора Окжетпес
Clicking attraction opens modal with details
360° view via Pannellum iframe is loading correctly in modal
Caption '360° demo view. Final version will be attraction-specific.' is displayed under iframe
Review system visible - 5-star rating and comment form present
Eco-taxi tab works - form with 'Откуда'/'Куда' inputs and 'Заказать такси' button
Hotels tab shows hotel list (Eco Resort Burabay in Burabay region)
Hotel cards display price, partner badge, and booking button
critical_code_review_comments: Console warning about <span> in <option> from i18n could be cleaned up by using t() function directly without wrapping span
test_credentials: Dynamically created test users with unique emails like test_user_{timestamp}@test.com / testpassword123
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - used dynamic registration for each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend testing completed successfully. 360° Pannellum iframe implementation verified working. All main features tested: auth, region selection, attractions with 360° view, reviews, eco-taxi, hotels. The iframe uses Pannellum CDN format as expected. No critical issues found.

features_tested.registration: PASS - New user registration works, redirects to region selection
features_tested.login: PASS - Login flow tested via registration
features_tested.region_selection: PASS - All 5 regions displayed, Burabay selection works
features_tested.attractions_tab: PASS - 3 attraction cards displayed for Burabay
features_tested.attraction_modal: PASS - Modal opens with attraction details
features_tested.360_view_iframe: PASS - Pannellum CDN iframe loading correctly
features_tested.360_caption: PASS - Caption text '360° demo view. Final version will be attraction-specific.' present
features_tested.review_system: PASS - Star rating and comment form visible and functional
features_tested.eco_taxi_tab: PASS - Taxi order form with inputs and button working
features_tested.hotels_tab: PASS - Hotel cards displayed with booking buttons
